title: Fix Hero section CTA button click handlers

requirements.summary: Fix the 'Explore Our Products' button to scroll smoothly to the products section when clicked
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking 'Explore Our Products' button scrolls to the products section
The scroll behavior is smooth and consistent with the navigation menu behavior
The button has proper cursor styling to indicate it is clickable

file_operations.description: Add onClick handler to the 'Explore Our Products' button that uses the same smooth scrolling implementation pattern from the Navigation component. The handler should call scrollToSection('products') or use document.getElementById('products')?.scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth', block: 'start' }). Ensure the button has cursor-pointer class for proper cursor styling.
